str2: A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
Yet, nevertheless, even. Adverb from the base of homou; at the same time, i.e. notwithstanding, yet still.
From diatithemai; properly, a disposition, i.e. a contract.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: To ratify, confirm, make valid, reaffirm, assure. From the same as kurios; to make authoritative, i.e. Ratify.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From a compound of a and a derivative of tithemi; to set aside, i.e. to disesteem, neutralize or violate.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make an additional testamentary disposition, To furnish with additions.
